page.title: 17The Environment
page.content: The air freshness of the area is quite good because of its elevated position and the hills around.However on the main roads fumes and noise from cars make the area less attractive.The road safety is poor as the roads are busy and often have parked cars.The roads contain a lot of litter and some road signs are covered with graffiti.The pavements are poor,often broken and uneven,because they are old and badly maintained and because tree roots have pushed some of them up. Some of the council estates have a run down appearance but most of the modern housing estates are attractive and well maintained.Their main problem is inadequate street lighting. Generally the area is attractive with modern housing and green open space.
